thread.title: John Long
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by John Long

author: John Long
title: John Long
text: This was a delivery/pickup due to some manufacturer defects. After many phone calls snd emails we finally received a fair resolution. Extremely happy with the quick delivery and nice tracking program so you are not just sitting around waiting. Great customer service team!
